task_description: Generate 12 surreal object-modifier pairs for AISMR video production

quality_criteria: Each modifier must be unique within this run
Must not duplicate recent modifiers (check last 50 runs in archive)
Must align with surreal_impossible tone from guardrails
Must be concrete, visualizable, and tactile
Risky or boundary-pushing concepts must be flagged
At least 3 references to archive memories for inspiration
Knowledge_get results are referenced to avoid duplicates and respect guardrails.
workflow_steps: Call knowledge_get with persona "iggy" and project "aismr" to review creative guardrails and past modifier knowledge before ideating.
Load Brendan's brief and project context via memory_search
Search archive for recent AISMR modifiers to avoid duplication
Validate each for originality and guardrail compliance
Document creative rationale for each concept
Hand off to Riley with clear instructions
success_definition: 12 approved modifiers that pass novelty check, guardrail validation, and are ready for screenplay conversion
